titleStmt.title: Discourse of the peerage & jurisdiction of the Lords spirituall in Parliament proving from the fundamental laws of the land, the testimony of the most renowned authors, and the practice of all ages : that have no right in claiming any jurisdiction in capital matters.
titleStmt.author: Barlow, Thomas, 1607-1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Barlow. Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
